Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;10 Methanol^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;甲醇^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: So you now have an ^orange;extraction lab^reset;, but aren't sure what to do with it? It's simple, really. Go place it somewhere, and toss a bunch of ^orange;logs^reset; in there. 10 should do. ^green;Bring me back 2 Methanol^reset;.
Texts.Chs: 那么你现在应该已经有一个^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，但是你还不知道如何使用？好吧，其实它是一台非常简单的机器，你只需要将它放置在任何地方，然后尝试着放^green;10个原木^reset;进去，最后记得把产出物带给我。

Texts.Eng: That, my friend, is how you make methanol. Now let's move on to cobblestone!
Texts.Chs: 好叻，现在你已经知道如何制作甲醇了，那么接下来轮到鹅卵石吧。
